post.body: sadly, I do not. I am strictly a meatatarian :-(
nahhh, couldn't be!
lucky they found it so quickly. You gonna be in the office tomorrow?
is this the latest installment of Prince of Persia? Considering getting it for xbox. How is it?
dude, I am so bummed that I won't be at your party this year :-(
ouch. Hope it all works out for him
what's wrong?
for realz!
perhaps this is the problem: http://tinyurl.com/62rdo7
and it replies, "it sounded like you said 'I would like to pay you for nothing', if this is correct, press 1 now."
will food and a session of fetch be enough for forgiveness?
may I ask where you work?
I'll have to look into meditation
haha, I watched a bulldozer pushing snow around outside my apt and bury a car. Watched this morning as the guy dug it out.
step 1. Move cat to another room. Step 2. Retreat back to bedroom and close the door. Step 3. Profit.
I know this isn't obvious, but you can pick them up and move them - even whilst purring ;-)
I meant when do you plan on being back from California :)
when do you get back into town?
congrats dude! I have a feeling this will be a very merry christmas for you guys :)
pretty good movie, yea?
sorry to hear that :(
now that is a survival food. Mmm. Bacon cookies.
& @robotsasquatch JINX!! Now neither of you can tweet for a while or something. I forget the rules.
has reminded me that it has been hours since my last tweet. I must rectify this.
that seems to be happening to you a lot lately, no?
vomiting snorplet does not sound good, hope he's feeling better soon. (notice that I completely disregard your health status <3)
you stole my evening plans!
hah, another lance follower in the neighborhood!
back to textbox.cpp hacking...
why did I think that TextBox was implemented as a container of 1 or more TextBlock elements? I believe I may be mistaken...
Btw, no need to thank me for this info as I consider it a public service, pointing the folks of Boston to Tasty Lunches(tm). Enjoy.
Speaking of Emma's, it appears that Phil has designed a new, easier, sandwich called The Meatball Grinder. Very tasty.
On the topic of bacon, Emma's chicken pags are the best source in these here parts, followed by the heaping handfuls offered at Sebastien's
Bacon
just finished watching Dark Knight.
I just accidently the System.Windows.Data namespace
is seriously slacking in the tweet department lately
Is it just me or does it smell like up-dog in here?
Popular survival foods of choice here at the Quincy Shaws: potato chips, onion dip, and ice cream. Really, people?? Really?
omw to Shaws before the storm hits
